**Loading Libraries**

```{.r .cell-code}

```
:::


**Reading data and presenting them as a dataframe**


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz_2014_shp <- st_read(dsn = "C:/edwing444/IS415-GAA/In_Class_Excercise/In_Class_Ex2/data", 
                layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL")
```

**Writing a KML file using data from ESRI shapefile**


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
st_write(mpsz_2014_shp,
         "C:/edwing444/IS415-GAA/In_Class_Excercise/In_Class_Ex2/data/MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL.kml",
         delete_dsn = TRUE)
```
:::

**Transforming data**

```
Reading layer `PRESCHOOLS_LOCATION' from data source 
  `C:\edwing444\IS415-GAA\In_Class_Excercise\In_Class_Ex2\data\PreSchoolsLocation.kml'

Simple feature collection with 2290 features and 2 fields
Geometry type: POINT
Dimension:     XYZ
Bounding box:  xmin: 103.6878 ymin: 1.247759 xmax: 103.9897 ymax: 1.462134
z_range:       zmin: 0 zmax: 0
Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
```


:::
:::


**Reading Population data**


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
popdata <- read.csv("C:/edwing444/IS415-GAA/In_Class_Excercise/In_Class_Ex2/data/respopagesextod2023.csv")
```
:::


**Preparing the data**


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
popdata2023 <- popdata %>% 
  group_by(PA,SZ,AG) %>% 
  summarise(`POP`=sum(`Pop`)) %>% 
  ungroup %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from=AG, 
              values_from=POP) %>% 
  mutate(YOUNG = rowSums(.[3:6])) %>% 
  mutate(`ECONOMY ACTIVE` = rowSums(.[16:21])) %>%
  mutate(`AGED`=rowSums(.[16:21])) %>%
  mutate(`TOTAL`=rowSums(.[3:21])) %>%  
  mutate(`DEPENDENCY` = (`YOUNG` + `AGED`)
         /`ECONOMY ACTIVE`)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'PA', 'SZ'. You can override using the
`.groups` argument.
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
colnames(popdata2023)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
 [1] "PA"             "SZ"             "0_to_4"         "10_to_14"      
 [5] "15_to_19"       "20_to_24"       "25_to_29"       "30_to_34"      
 [9] "35_to_39"       "40_to_44"       "45_to_49"       "50_to_54"      
[13] "55_to_59"       "5_to_9"         "60_to_64"       "65_to_69"      
[17] "70_to_74"       "75_to_79"       "80_to_84"       "85_to_89"      
[21] "90_and_Over"    "YOUNG"          "ECONOMY ACTIVE" "AGED"          
[25] "TOTAL"          "DEPENDENCY"    
```


:::
:::


**Changing the names to upper case**


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
popdata2023 <- popdata2023 %>% 
  mutate_at(.vars = vars(PA, SZ), 
            .funs = list(toupper))
```
:::


**Join the MPSZ table and Population table on the subzone_n**


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz_pop2023 <- left_join(mpsz_2014_shp, popdata2023,
                          by = c("SUBZONE_N" = "SZ"))
```
:::
